sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {AuthService} from "../../services/auth.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent { constructor(private authService: AuthService) { } onSubmit(formValue: any) { this.authService.login(formValue?.value?.email, formValue?.value?.password); } }

Login

Please login to your admin account to post a new blog post

Email Cannot Be Empty
Pleas enter a valid email address
Password Cannot Be Empty
